column4: hey all, i have an usual but in unusual problem...: fresh install of lucid, visual effects we're set to normal and (as i expected), slow window performance min/max/move, so i set visual effects to none and now its fixed, but i would like the effects, so i entered the 'radeon.modset=0' in grub, rebooted (thinking now all will be fine) only to come to, "cannot enable desktop effects"   =(  ...
, un-install drivers u av,, reboot, then hardware search again, in stall and reboot.. problem still means driver problem.. forum for solution..
whatever driver lucid assigns ati radeon, is whats installed now... the driver manager doesnt show any...
